summary: In 1930's Cuba, a bank clerk and an American mercenary assist a revolutionary group in a plan to kill the President but the Cuban Secret Police chief and the dictator's military complicate the plan's execution.
cast: Jennifer Jones|John Garfield|Pedro Armendáriz|Gilbert Roland|Ramon Novarro|Wally Cassell|David Bond|José Pérez|Morris Ankrum|Abdullah Abbas|Mimi Aguglia|Salvador Baguez|Argentina Brunetti|Spencer Chan|Freddie Chapman|Gertrude Chorre|Jack Clisby|Helen Dickson|Fred Godoy|Lelia Goldoni|Herschel Graham|Charles Granucci|Roberta Haynes|Ted Hecht|Rodolfo Hoyos Jr.|John Huston|Robert Malcolm|Paul Marion|Santiago Martínez|Alex McSweyn|Tina Menard|Paulo Monte|Alex Montoya|Alberto Morin|Alfonso Pedroza|Rodd Redwing|Tito Renaldo|Joel Rene|Julian Rivero|Edwin Rochelle|Joe Sawaya|Leonard Strong|Robert Tafur|Felipe Turich|Harry J. Vejar|Peter Virgo|Billy Wilson|Thomas Quon Woo
title: Éramos desconocidos
